meanings.definition: A person who is not officially recognized or appointed.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the nonofficials sat quietly at the back.
meanings.sent2: The nonofficials were not allowed to participate in the official ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The nonofficials tried to sneak into the VIP section but were caught.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the nonofficials, everyone's opinion mattered equally.
meanings.sent5: The nonofficials formed their own group to discuss important matters.

meanings.sent1: The nonofficials report was not accepted by the board.
meanings.sent2: She received a nonofficials warning about her behavior.
meanings.sent3: The nonofficials party was a fun, unofficial gathering.
meanings.sent4: His nonofficials status didn't stop him from making a difference.
meanings.sent5: The nonofficials document was not considered valid by the authorities.
